title: Force between two current carrying wires

content.prompt: Two parallel wires, each carrying a current I, repel each other with a force F. If both currents are doubled, the force of repulsion is

choices.label: 2 2 F MathType@MTEF@5@5@@389B@

4 2 F MathType@MTEF@5@5@@389B@
